text: Oyeniyi Abejoye (born 16 January 1994) is a Nigerian track and field athlete who specialises in the 110 metres hurdles and also competes as a sprinter. He competed at the 2018 Commonwealth Games in the 110 metres hurdles. At the 2019 African Games, he competed in the 110 metres hurdles, winning a silver medal. He was a member of the Nigerian relay team that won a silver medal in the 2019 African Games. He won the 110-meters hurdles silver medal at the 2018 African Athletics Championships in Asaba. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:African Games competitors for Nigeria Category:African Games medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:African Games silver medalists for Nigeria Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2018 Commonwealth Games Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2019 African Games Category:Commonwealth Games competitors for Nigeria Category:Nigerian male sprinters Category:Nigerian male hurdlers Category:Sportspeople from Lagos State Category:Yoruba sportspeople
title: Oyeniyi Abejoye
